Function: Device 0 size setting Set a 30-bit value for the size of memory connected as device 0. Settings larger than 8-Mbyte for OctaRAM is prohibited. -0x00000000: 120-Mbyte memory- -0x01000006. 16-Mbyte memory Example 0x00800000: 8-Mbyte

memory
Device 0 type setting 00: flash on device 0 0 1: RAM on device 0
